CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Global Indemnity Group LLC provides both admitted and non-admitted specialty property and casualty insurance coverages and individual policyholder coverages in the United States, as well as reinsurance worldwide. The company's four primary segments are Commercial Specialty; Exited Lines; Farm, Ranch, & Stable; and Reinsurance.
